description: This module is really simple, so for now this checks out from the given branch of a repo at a particular SHA or tag. Latest is not supported, you should not be doing that.
author: Dane Summers
notes: Requires subversion and grep on the client.

examples.description: Export subversion repository in a specified folder

description: The subversion URL to the repository.
Absolute path where the repository should be deployed.
If yes, any modified files in the working repository will be discarded. If no, this module will fail if it encounters modified files.
